mapper.select: select sx.id,sx.weld_no,sx.weld_cid,sx.weld_code,sx.weld_ip,sx.weld_model,power_supply, dic.value_name powerSupplyStr,wire_feeder_model,dic1.value_name wireFeederModelStr, weld_kind,dic2.value_name weldKindStr,sx.weld_cpu_num,sx.cpu1_no,cpu1_model,dic3.value_name cpu1ModelStr, sx.cpu1_version,sx.cpu2_no,cpu2_model,dic4.value_name cpu2ModelStr, sx.cpu2_version,sx.cpu3_no,cpu3_model,dic5.value_name cpu3ModelStr,sx.cpu3_version,weld_status, dic6.value_name weldStatusStr,weld_firm,dic7.value_name weldFirmStr, dept_id,dept.name deptIdStr,sx.create_time from machine_weldsx_info sx left join sys_dictionary dic on dic.id = sx.power_supply left join sys_dictionary dic1 on dic1.id = sx.wire_feeder_model left join sys_dictionary dic2 on dic2.id = sx.weld_kind left join sys_dictionary dic3 on dic3.id = sx.cpu1_model left join sys_dictionary dic4 on dic4.id = sx.cpu2_model left join sys_dictionary dic5 on dic5.id = sx.cpu3_model left join sys_dictionary dic6 on dic6.id = sx.weld_status left join sys_dictionary dic7 on dic7.id = sx.weld_firm left join sys_dept dept on dept.id = sx.dept_id

select sx.id,sx.weld_no,sx.weld_cid,sx.weld_code,sx.weld_ip,sx.weld_model,dic.value_name powerSupplyStr,dic1.value_name wireFeederModelStr, dic2.value_name weldKindStr,sx.weld_cpu_num,sx.cpu1_no,dic3.value_name cpu1ModelStr,sx.cpu1_version,sx.cpu2_no,dic4.value_name cpu2ModelStr, sx.cpu2_version,sx.cpu3_no,dic5.value_name cpu3ModelStr,sx.cpu3_version,dic6.value_name weldStatusStr,dic7.value_name weldFirmStr, dept.name deptIdStr,sx.create_time from machine_weldsx_info sx left join sys_dictionary dic on dic.id = sx.power_supply left join sys_dictionary dic1 on dic1.id = sx.wire_feeder_model left join sys_dictionary dic2 on dic2.id = sx.weld_kind left join sys_dictionary dic3 on dic3.id = sx.cpu1_model left join sys_dictionary dic4 on dic4.id = sx.cpu2_model left join sys_dictionary dic5 on dic5.id = sx.cpu3_model left join sys_dictionary dic6 on dic6.id = sx.weld_status left join sys_dictionary dic7 on dic7.id = sx.weld_firm left join sys_dept dept on dept.id = sx.dept_id where sx.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update machine_weldsx_info set weld_no = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldNo},weld_cid = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldCid}, weld_code = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldCode},weld_ip = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldIp}, weld_model = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldModel},power_supply = #{machineWeldsxInfo.powerSupply}, wire_feeder_model = #{machineWeldsxInfo.wireFeederModel}, weld_kind = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldKind},weld_cpu_num = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldCpuNum}, cpu1_no = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu1No}, cpu1_model = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu1Model},cpu1_version = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu1Version}, cpu2_no = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu2No},cpu2_model = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu2Model}, cpu2_version = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu2Version},cpu3_no = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu3No}, cpu3_model = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu3Model}, cpu3_version = #{machineWeldsxInfo.cpu3Version},weld_status = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldStatus}, weld_firm = #{machineWeldsxInfo.weldFirm},dept_id = #{machineWeldsxInfo.deptId},create_time = #{machineWeldsxInfo.createTime} where id = #{machineWeldsxInfo.id}
